Package userAPI.interfaces

Interface DbInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
MySQLDb
public interface DbInterface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    connect()
    This method connects the current object to a database, making them usable.
    void
    disconnect()
    This method disconnects the current object to a database, making them unusable until that is reconnected.
    Connection
    getConnection()
    Getter method for the connection object.
    boolean
    isConnected()
    This method indicates whether the current object is already connected to the database.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      void connect()
      This method connects the current object to a database, making them usable.

    • disconnect

      void disconnect()
      This method disconnects the current object to a database, making them unusable until that is reconnected.

    • isConnected

      boolean isConnected()
      This method indicates whether the current object is already connected to the database.
      Returns:
      true if is connected, else false.

    • getConnection

      Connection getConnection()
      Getter method for the connection object.
      Returns:
      the SQLConnection object representing the connection to the database.
